hero.title: IsaBeauty Studio
hero.subtitle: Radiating from the inside and out starts here—IsaBeauty makes sure you feel your most beautiful.

lymfe.title: Lymphatic Drainage
lymfe.description: Lymphatic drainage is a gentle massage that stimulates lymph circulation, helps remove toxins, and reduces fluid retention.

presso.title: Pressotherapy
presso.description: Stimulates the lymphatic system and venous circulation, accelerates lymph elimination, promotes relaxation, and supports the detoxification and purification of the body.

mas.title: Massage
mas.description: Relieves tension and relaxes the muscles.

option.rug_description: Relieves tension and relaxes the muscles in the upper back.
option.voet_description: Stimulates blood circulation and reduces fatigue in the legs and feet.
option.full_description: A soothing massage for the entire body.

endo.title: Endermologie
endo.description: Endermologie is a technique of mechanical massage that uses rollers and gentle suction to stimulate blood and lymph circulation. It helps reduce cellulite, firms the skin, and improves the removal of toxins, creating a smoother and firmer body shape.

lip.title: Lipolaser
lip.description: Lipolaser is a technology that uses low-intensity lasers to liquefy stored fat, facilitating the natural elimination of fat by the body. Perfect for refining body shape without pain or invasive procedures.

ontharing.title: Laser Hair Removal Popular Combos
ontharing.description: Laser hair removal is a fast and safe way to reduce hair growth long-term. With our professional laser, you enjoy smooth skin without shaving or waxing.

eximia.title: Eximia HR77
eximia.description: Eximia is a non-invasive treatment for skin tightening, fat reduction, and cellulite.

exBody.title: Eximia upper + lower legs
exBody.description: Eximia is a non-invasive treatment for skin tightening, fat reduction, and cellulite.

exLegs.title: Eximia legs
exLegs.title2: Eximia Body Treatment - Upper and lower legs + buttocks
exLegs.description: Eximia is a non-invasive treatment for skin tightening, fat reduction, and cellulite.

exRug.title: Eximia back, abdomen and waist
exRug.title2: Eximia Body Treatment - Back, abdomen and waist
exRug.description: Eximia is a non-invasive treatment for skin tightening, fat reduction, and cellulite.

exArmen.title: Eximia Arms
exArmen.description: Eximia is a non-invasive treatment for skin tightening, fat reduction, and cellulite.

gezichtsbehandeling.title: Facial Treatment
gezichtsbehandeling.description: Pamper your skin with our specialized facial treatments, designed to reveal your natural beauty.

option.intensive_duration: Provides deep hydration for smooth, firm, and radiant skin. Suitable for all skin types, especially dehydrated and dull skin.
option.antiAging_duration: Stimulates collagen production and reduces the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines. This treatment firms the skin, improves elasticity, and offers an instant brightening effect.
option.acne_duration: Advanced treatment for acne-prone and inflamed skin. Exosomes help restore the skin barrier, reduce redness, regulate sebum production, and improve healing of blemishes.
option.shine_duration: Ideal for dull skin and skin prone to pigmentation. This treatment brightens the complexion, evens the skin tone, and gives an instant boost while deeply hydrating.
option.micro_duration: Cleansing + serum (vitamin) + soothing mask or LED therapy

peeling.title: Peeling
peeling.description:
Salicylic Acid Peel 30%: Oily and acne-prone skin
Mandelic Acid Peel 50%: Sensitive and dull skin
Glycolic Acid Peel 50%: Mature and tired skin
Kojiderm Peel: Skin prone to hyperpigmentation
Lactic Acid Peel 50%: Dry and sensitive skin

radio.title: Radiofrequency
radio.description: Radiofrequency stimulates collagen production to firm the skin and reduce wrinkles.

led.title: LED Phototherapy
led.description: LED Phototherapy uses light of different wavelengths to stimulate skin regeneration and enhance radiance. Per session (45 min) €45, includes cleansing + meso solutions.

afslankend.title: Slimming
afslankend.description: Endermologie is a mechanical massage technique that uses rollers and gentle suction to stimulate blood and lymphatic circulation. It helps reduce cellulite, firms the skin, and improves toxin drainage, resulting in a smoother and more toned body shape.

detoxLichaam.title: Body Detox
detoxLichaam.description: Scrub, drainage (exclusive method), body wrap with heating blanket + infrared (60 min)

detoxFace.title: Detox Face
detoxFace.description: This facial treatment includes a deep cleansing, followed by an enzymatic or mechanical exfoliation, vapozone with comedone extraction, and the application of a purifying mask. It purifies and balances the skin, ideal for tired skin prone to impurities and pollution. Helps unclog pores and restores the skin’s natural glow.

option.face_duration: This facial treatment includes a deep cleansing, followed by an enzymatic or mechanical exfoliation, vapozone with comedone extraction, and the application of a purifying mask. It purifies and balances the skin, ideal for tired skin prone to impurities and pollution. Helps unclog pores and restores the skin’s natural glow.
